description:
We are excited to announce our June meetup which will be all around Leveraging Cloud Computing for Increased Sustainability.

This will be held in central Bristol on June 29th, kicking off at 6:30pm for food and drinks.

The panel lineup is as follows:

\- Prakriti Karthause \(Facilitator\) \- Senior Platform Engineering Manager at Vodafone

\- Bhupendra Hirani \(Panellist\) \- Cloud Economist at Kainos
\- Will Rowley \(Panellist\) \- Cloud Practice Lead at Microsoft
\- Alec Wilson \(Panellist\) \- Senior Software Engineer at tumelo
\- Priya Baheti \(Panellist\) \- Solution Architecture Manager at EY Technology Solutions

Agenda:
\- Kick\-off at 6:30 for Pizza and Beers \+ Soft Drinks
\- SR2 and Meetup intro at 7pm
\- Panel discussion with a brief break in the middle
\- Wrap up around 8:15 \- 8:30pm with Q&A

Details:
📍 - Framework Bristol, 35 King Street, Framework, Bristol BS1 4DZ
🗓️ 29th June 2023
🕠 18:30
📢 Panel Event
🍕🍺/🥤 Pizza and Beer/Soft drinks will be provided

Join the Slack channel to interact and chat with other community members! -
https://join.slack.com/t/bristol-cn-and-devops/shared_invite/zt-1um80612s-tl1cw9V0qnoIVdD6hypyLw
title: Leveraging Cloud Computing for Increased Sustainability
